title: Episode #22: Stephen Tankel on Pakistan, Afghanistan, and Lashkar-e-Taiba
itunes:title: Episode #22: Stephen Tankel on Pakistan, Afghanistan, and Lashkar-e-Taiba
itunes:subtitle: Ritika Singh interviews American University scholar Stephen Tankel on Pakistani counterterrorism cooperation, the endgame in Afghanistan, and Lashkar-e-Taiba.
description:
